entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady.
